model_answer: The answer is D: [00:04:04 - 00:05:21]. In this segment, the woman in pink describes her experience of performing at The Roxy and feeling pressured to replicate her previous success at The Troubadour. The man in the blue uniform also comments on the stage being epic, adding to the lively conversation happening on the couch.
The segment where the duo performs a playful “cookie toast” is from [00:06:58 - 00:07:37].
